name: 乔舒亚·福特
introduction: Joshua Ford is a British Actor born March 9th 1993 in High Wycombe, England. He is the son of Robert and Jackie Brown, has three brothers Nik, Oliver & Richard and was raised in Buckinghamshire, UK.Ford graduated from The Royal Birmingham Conservatoire (Formerly Birmingham School of Acting) with a first class degree in Acting and the prestigious John Gielgud Award.Besides regular theatrical appearances, Joshua is best known for the role of Scientist and keeper of the peace, Harry in Cosmos.He has also appeared in award winning Lake Erie Murders as Andy Gustafson, and Autopsy: The Last Hours of... playing the role of Burt Reynolds.
